title: Summary
synopsis: An experienced backend developer with expert proficiency in the native Python3 libraries and related technologies. Specialising in computer vision, web frameworks and data processing
notes: Web Frameworks: Django, Flask, SQLite, Pyramid, NGINX, Apache
Web Frontend: Bootstrap, CSS, HTML, JavaScript
RESTful API Integration: Django REST Framework, Google Ads, OAuth2, Azure AD
Computer Vision: OpenCV, Scikit-Image, SimpleITK, numpy, imutils
This website includes contact details and links to relevant personal resources as well as a portfolio of past projects. GJ
